description.value: You grew up near fey and learned to appreciate their love of mischief, earning their blessing in return. Choose either @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.WBmvzNDfpwka3qT4], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.atlgGNI1E1Ox3O3a], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.pwzdSlJgYqN7bs2w], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Qw3fnUlaUbnn7ipC], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.AUctDF2fqPZN2w4W], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.uZK2BYzPnxUBnDjr]. You can cast the chosen cantrip as a primal innate spell at will. A cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up. In addition, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws against effects from fey creatures.
